name: Jira Printable Cards
body:
### Getting started:

1. Drag [Print JIRA Cards Bookmarklet](javascript:(function()%7B var script %3D document.createElement("script")%3B script.src %3D "https://avoinicu.github.io/jira-printable-cards/bookmarklet.js"%3B document.body.appendChild(script)%3B document.body.removeChild(script)%3B %7D)()%3B) to your bookmarks bar.
2. Go to JIRA
3. Select the cards that you want to print
4. Click on the newly created bookmark
5. Enjoy the awesomeness!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
